website_summaries.verdict: If you need an additional smoke detector in a remote area, this is the one to get. Communicates wirelessly with existing RF-enabled systems but also works independently. Best single unit on the market for replacements or additions.
pros: Wireless interconnectivity eliminates the need to rewire entire house for single new unit
RF transmitter activates other alarms in area
Smart button shuts off false or cooking alarms immediately
cons: Expensive, and must be hardwired to the same circuit as other wireless units
False alarms are fairly common complaints from users
May not be compatible with existing Kidde mounting plates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect upgrade to my older Kiddie smoke/carbon monoxide unit
customer_reviews.text: After 7 years, my older Kiddie (smoke/carbon monoxide) was at its end of life. I liked the functions of the alarm/voice alarm features in my older Kiddie, so the new Kiddie was the perfect upgrade. This new model only takes two AA batteries (included) compared to my older Kiddie model which took three AA batteries. The new Kiddie model, mounted right up to my original Kiddie brackets, there was no need to install the new bracket.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product as a replacement for an older Kidde smoke alarm that was past it's prime. The new alarm continuously gives a low battery warning even when using fresh batteries (I tried 2 sets). I'm trying to return the product, but the Amazon returns site is saying this item can't be returned. After reading their return policy it is unclear why this is the case. After ordering things from Amazon for nearly 20 years, this is the first time I've ever had such an issue. Needless to say, I am extremely dissatisfied. Maybe I'll have better luck dealing directly with the manufacturer, but I will certainly think twice before buying anything through Amazon in the future.
customer_reviews.author: S. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Almost impossible to install batteries
customer_reviews.text: My old kiddie smoke detector, with 3 rear facing batteries died a few days ago. I purchased the new kiddie alarm with 2 front facing batteries because one reviewer stated that it fits on the old wall mount device. This is true. My issue is with the difficulty of installing the batteries. There are 2 red plastic objects where the batteries go, that basically push the batteries out. I had to try to read the instructions on battery installation. After about 20 or 25 minutes, I finally wrestled the batteries in and managed to close the battery door. I do not look forward to ever having to replace the batteries, which is important for the functioning of the device.
customer_reviews.author: china blue

customer_reviews.title: Easy on replacement
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace an older unit that had alerted to its end of life. This unit installed onto the wall-mounted base from the previous unit perfectly. I expect battery life and life of the unit to be similar to prior, which must have been great since I could never remember how long it had been since it last needed batteries. The alarm, both voice and siren, is plenty loud for the 2 bedroom 1 bath main floor of my bungalow style house, as I found out recently when my husband was frying bacon and couldn't figure out that the smoke getting thick in the kitchen was from burning toast behind him. Now on to read toaster reviews ...
customer_reviews.author: Denise N

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be returned
customer_reviews.text: Be aware smoke detectors cannot be returned on Amazon. I found out the hard way because it does not say that anywhere in the description. Since there are so many choices, it's much better to pick one up at Home Depot or another big box store where you can see the size and ensure it's the correct one for your home or business.
customer_reviews.author: Vman

customer_reviews.title: SMOKE DETECTOR DIED IN 7 MONTHS HOW DO I GET REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY ?
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of this Detectors Model KN-COSM-XRA-BA because of the rating. Both of these have now failed. When they started to chirp, I installed new batteries. The chirp continues. I got more NEW batteries and installed them and the chip continues. How do I get these replaced under warranty?? Mike Jacobs email mjacobs@jacobsandson.com
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Thanks, Kidde
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I haven't had an emergency to know if this will work when I need it, but I can say that unlike First Alert detectors, this one has never given a false alarm, doesn't need to be cleaned constantly, and doesn't look chintzy. It always tests out okay and otherwise keeps its mouth shut (and it kind of has a mouth because it talks). I trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend getting a combination smoke and carbon monoxide detector. About a year and half ago my furnace went out releasing carbon monoxide which set off the alarm. This gave me time to shut down the furnace before it became hazardous to my health. At the time I had older Kidde alarm which I have since replaced with this one. Too bad the name sounds like a child's toy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Love the voice feature!
customer_reviews.text: This product is well built by a trusted company. I needed a combination of smoke & carbon dioxide detector and this was a great value. I love the voice that differentiates the reason for the alarm, smoke/carbon dioxide, easier than having to remember what short beeps versus long beeps mean. Easy to install and it comes with batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I really cannot judge the battery life as I just installed it. This purchase was a recommendation by another RV owner as a replacement for a unit no longer manufactured. I used the baseplate from the previous unit as a template and installed into the existing holes. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: very soft spoken
customer_reviews.text: This "talking" smoke alarm is worthless if you are looking an alarm that you can hear talk. I have excellent hearing and tested this while it was on my lap and could barely hear the talking. I bought this thinking it would have a loud, deep "voice" for people that have a hard time hearing high pitched sounds. The voice was also high pitched and very soft spoken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to install/ Amazon no return/prime sucks
customer_reviews.text: Not standard installation. Kidde is horrible replacement for First Alert. Amazon refused my return. Amazon prime sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this alarm because I already own rechargeable batteries that I wanted to use. I have used rechargeable batteries in other models and haven't had a problem. Unfortunately after 2 hours the alarm starts beeping saying low battery. I began using the alarm after the Amazon return time so I cannot return it through them and when I called Kidde they said that this type of alarm does not work with rechargeable batteries so there is nothing they will do about it. It did not state this specifically when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: JThor

customer_reviews.title: But it!
customer_reviews.text: Saved our lives. A week after installation, we had a carbon monoxide leak in the house from a furnace issue. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W.

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep you alive!
customer_reviews.text: I got two and they're most excellent though the alarm 'voice' is too sexy and too low; however, the alarm is piercing and effective. They're good to have, period, and I was overdue.
customer_reviews.author: DonSanAnto

customer_reviews.title: Great basic smoke & carbon monoxide detector.
customer_reviews.text: Great basic smoke and carbon monoxide detector. Both siren and voice to alert you. Batteries included (double AAs). I always change mine twice a year, so can't speak to battery life if left longer. Easy mount with backplate & screws included. Then just twist main unit onto backplate. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: NYLady

customer_reviews.title: Write down the date you install !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 detectors. #1 get the combo smoke and carbon monoxide detectors - in my case that means having 5 rather than 10. #2 change all the batteries on one date (ie New Years Day, Birthday, etc. so it's easy to remember then write it down somewhere. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Very Reliable brand
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and wall mount. Been buying this brand forever and I am old so that is a long time. Very well amde product, if you want your family safe buy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: READING REVIEWS AND QUESTIONS BEFORE BUYING ASSISTED ME IN LEARNING THIS ALARM WOULD FIT THE SAME MOUNTING RING, SO JUST BACK THE OLD ONE OFF AND PUT THE NEW ONE ON. ALSO WITH BATTERIES ENCLOSED, VERY SIMPLE. IF IT LASTS AS LONG AS THE LAST KIDDE, NO COMPLAINTS.
customer_reviews.author: billie avery

customer_reviews.title: Check the product carefully
customer_reviews.text: Product was mislabeled. What was inside the box was not what was snickered on the box. Had difficulty returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: David Sinason

customer_reviews.title: i bought 2 all of a suddan it started to squeel load why dont  know put new batt
customer_reviews.text: squeeled again no fire it just squeeled tried everthing just put in trash no reason for the malfuntion i guess its just a cheep ome i bought many things have not had problems just i fire detector that just went off no fire spend more get one that might safe a life
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY TELLS THE WAY IT IS AFTER USEING  GOOD OR BAD

customer_reviews.title: great upgrade for Kiddie product
customer_reviews.text: After 7 years, my older Kiddie (smoke/carbon monoxide) was at its end-of-life. The new model only takes two AA batteries (included) and the batteries front load, you don't have to dismount to exchange batteries, and I bought two one for the basement and one for the main living space.
customer_reviews.author: Oscarpopcan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last longer than a year
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this alarm for the convenience of a voice telling you exactly why the alarm is sounding. We've had the unit for almost exactly a year and it's now broken. Started going off in the middle of the night saying "fire!" and beeping. Would be great if there was fire but there's not. Tried blowing air in the unit and replacing batteries with no luck. Pretty disappointed that a 10 year unit is failing after one year.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: We have 7 of these throughout the house. The awesome part is the VOICE WARNINGS! My Mom was legally blind and she could HEAR what was happening! It is sensitive and picks up very very well. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as store-sold unit - replace by date ambiguous
customer_reviews.text: Came in a plain contractor bulk purchase box, though I assume the detector is the same one you would buy in a store. Although I purchased it April, 2015, the back had a sticker saying replace after May 2014 - I assume this was actually the manufacture date, not the replace by date. However, it made me uncomfortable since this is life safety equipment. If I had it to do over, I would have just bought this from a brick and mortar retailer for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: mbj

customer_reviews.title: ... this point I have received and mounted the Kidde Intelligent Alarm Battery Operated
customer_reviews.text: At this point I have received and mounted the Kidde Intelligent Alarm Battery Operated. It was easy to mount and test but I won't know how well it works until I have a fire or a CO problem. I'm satisfied with the device.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: How do you rate something that you haven’t needed to use? These fit the old mounting bases, only use two batteries instead of three and the sound is loud enough. The voice telling you if it’s a fire or carbon monoxide could be louder, though.
customer_reviews.author: DonC

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a rental house and thought I would try it first. Great voice alarm alternative warning.
customer_reviews.author: paula hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from older model
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and simple upgrade from an older model. Smoke detectors save lives!
customer_reviews.author: JoeyNick

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: This mounted right on the previous screws - yes that made it easy. Good Value. I cannot comment on the battery life yet. But it is supposed to last.
customer_reviews.author: LMO

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase. I could not find this particular model in the stores. I like the fact that it's a combo smoke/carbon dioxide alarm with voice technology.
customer_reviews.author: avid consumer

customer_reviews.title: No false alarms yet after 7 months.  Working Great!
customer_reviews.text: I installed these 7 months ago and these are working great. I feared we might get false alarms after reading other reviews, but have had none so far. The voice alarm is a little odd to me, but I only hear it when I am testing the alarm so that is no big deal. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: INSTALL EASILY
customer_reviews.text: PROVIDES A LOUD NOISE AND VERBAL ANOUNCMENT WHEN AN SMOKE OR CABONOZIDE ENTERS THE AREA OF THE ALARM. I LOVE IT.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Unit
customer_reviews.text: I have five of these and they are a sturdy quality unit.

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with Older Mounts.
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. Fits older wall-mounted plastic holders by Kidde. Just screw it in.
customer_reviews.author: W. Stotler

customer_reviews.title: New user friendly design.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace the original I had and glad I was able to find the updated version. Fit exactly in the same place as the old one. And I love the updated design which makes replacing the batteries much easier than before.👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its what we needed
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what is needed in the bedrooms and halls of our house
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Super easy install for a longtime customer
customer_reviews.text: Kiddie makes quality detectors. My family has been using them for many many years. After my old one finally died, I got this and it still fit the original holding bracket. Super easy install for a longtime customer! Other than that the build quality seems to remain with Kiddie. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mchua1291

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So far I've had no problems. I was worried that it was only going to speak & wasn't sure if there was beeping or if it would be loud enough from where I wanted to put it, but it's loud beeping is perfect & the voice is a decent level of sound. It arrived fast & easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Does as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Does as advertised, im happy with the alarm and would recommend it to others.

customer_reviews.title: Everything on this order was fine. I got a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Everything on this order was fine. I got a great product at a great price. Well packaged and fast shipment.

customer_reviews.title: Had one, bought another one
customer_reviews.text: We had an older model of this one that worked very well for seven years until it's planned end of service life. So, why not just get another one. So far, it works just as well as the last one.

customer_reviews.title: EXACT replacemant and was able to use old wall mount.
customer_reviews.text: Exact replacement for our original one that stopped working after 8 years. Did not need to replace the wall mount and this saved a lot of work and hassle!

customer_reviews.title: Super value good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and a must have in your home are apartment.

customer_reviews.title: but it seems to be just fine.
customer_reviews.text: You will never know just how well it works (or doesn't) until you NEED it. I haven't needed it, but it seems to be just fine.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I brought this as the secondary unit to a higher level one I already have

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice unit with upgraded features
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice unit with upgraded features. The unit distinguished smoke from carbon monoxide in test cycle by voice. Easy to replace an older unit since this come with 2 AA's. So I installed it the day it arrived. No problems at all.

customer_reviews.text: Seems affordable now until you have to replace the batteries, it will only accept KIDDE Batteries at $4.00+ EACH (Kidde 21025831 AA battery), try any other battery and it will continue to beep. Check the battery reviews for confirmation.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent item. Have had one for several years, and it expired. So glad to replace it

customer_reviews.title: The unit is very sensitive to smoke.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a condo with 12 foot ceilings. We are not able to replace batteries regularly so this unit was just right for us.

customer_reviews.title: You cant put a price on keeping you and your families life
customer_reviews.text: You cant put a price on keeping you and your families life. Works great, easy install. Buy it!

customer_reviews.title: Several broke... seems battery issue vs. ...
customer_reviews.text: Several broke... seems battery issue vs. components. Fresh and new Lithium batteries only lasting 1/4 as long as suggested. I would prefer a different product next time.

customer_reviews.title: Seems really good so far even tho we just got it a ...

customer_reviews.title: Product failed after less than three years.
customer_reviews.text: Product failed after less than three years. Warranty is highly limited and requires postage paid to and from. No worth executing the warranty

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: As described: well made and perfect for what we needed.

customer_reviews.text: Kiddie long term great history. Easy to set up, trust my life with it.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish it ran on 9 volt battery rather than two AA's, but that's becoming the trend with these devices.

customer_reviews.title: Short Life!!
customer_reviews.text: Aside for being Way too expensive, this device only lasted about a year and a 3 months. I was hoping not to have to replace or buy a new this soon. This time around I've chosen a different brand, so lets hope it is better than this piece of garbage. I am very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: A. De Los Santos

customer_reviews.title: Out With the Old and in With the New
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this weekend to replace one more than 10 years old. Let's see how they hold up!

customer_reviews.title: Decent combo alarm
customer_reviews.text: I already had this model before buying a second. The alarm is loud and clear and a voice alerts to what kind of issue (fire vs co2). Takes AA batteries instead of 9v.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy For Your Home and Family
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Gives us the peace of mind to know we have a carbon monoxide detector in our home for protection and safety for my family.

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit!  Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third unit I have purchased. I have been completely satisfied with the product and the service from Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: ... my fourth Kidde Nighthawk detector and they all perform great with little maintenance

customer_reviews.title: Kidde KN-COSM-XTR-BA Nighthawk Smoke/CO/2 Detector.

customer_reviews.title: A top quality product

customer_reviews.text: Product was poorly made. Alert volume was weak and did not always sound when there was smoke.

customer_reviews.title: A litttle a skewed . . .
customer_reviews.text: Everything expected was filled. One thing that seemed a skewed. In order to have the battery compartment align vertically when mounted to the wall, the mounting screws were not aligned horizontally to be perpendicular to the battery compartment when fully locked in. Either I didn't properly install it, or it wasn't designed to appear as the picture does on this page, or my OCD needs to be checked. -:)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F. Hindle

customer_reviews.title: purchased December 31, 2014, seems to be working ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased December 31, 2014, seems to be working, check building codes in your area, What I didn't know was effective January 1st 2015 Florida building codes require a 10 year sealed battery smoke alarm.

customer_reviews.title: on the ready for any fires

customer_reviews.text: Great item. Helps me sleep at night knowing that I am better protected.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend buying this product
customer_reviews.text: This product broke after less than six months of use. It just emits a continuous noise. The previous Kidde product lasted many years with no problems. I would not recommend buying this product.

customer_reviews.title: our appraiser said this was a good choice for carbon/fire protection
customer_reviews.text: When refi our house....our appraiser said this was a good choice for carbon/fire protection.....

customer_reviews.title: Works great!! Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Very easy to install. Battery compartment much easier to place or remove batteries than other ones I have had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Blain

customer_reviews.title: To be or not to be.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to really rate this other than it works. I have it up towards the ceiling not very far from a furnace floor vent. The oil furnace is ancient and 'rebuilt'. I can only hope for our lives that it will go off when the original heat exchanger finally springs a leak and spews carbon monoxide into the living space.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F

customer_reviews.title: Total Chinese Crap!
customer_reviews.text: Total Chinese CRAP! NOT the three battery version as advertised and deceptively in part number as "XTR-BA". This is the TWO AA battery version. Brand new alkalines will last no more that a month, high-grade 2800Mw AA rechargeables last only several days. So tired of manufacturers who lie about their products, lie about where products are made, even lie in the part number. What happened to honesty, good American made products that last?
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Brinson

customer_reviews.title: Wish the Voice Notification and Audible Beeping was Louder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in the lazarette on my boat where the onboard generator is mounted and run. The voice is very weak but thankfully, the audible beeping should be loud enough to be heard. I'm using this to supplement three hard-wired CO detectors I have in the living quarters of the boat.
customer_reviews.author: John Deutsch

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I like the voice warning. I'll buy a 2nd one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: The Product is fine. The delivery was not
customer_reviews.text: The Product is fine. The delivery was not. I have a sign on my gate saying: "Please bring packages to the front door." The package was left by ONTRAK on the ground in the rain at the head of the driveway just inside the gate. It was there for 6 hours,until I checked online and realized it had been delivered. This has been a consistent problem with ONTRAK. This is not satisfactory!
customer_reviews.author: M W

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a place around the kitchen to mount this
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: No Issues Yet
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for awhile now and have no issues with it. The design is simple and I like the idea of using cheaper batteries. I recommend this combo smoke/carbon monoxide detector.
customer_reviews.author: Roger J.Top Contributor: Photography

product_meta.title: Kidde Intelligent Detector Alarm Battery Operated Combination Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Detector Alarm | Model KN-COSM-XTR-BA
feature_bullets: Voice Alarm - Announces the hazard type detected thereby helping to speed up the correct reaction to the hazard detected. Alarm announces “Fire Fire” when a smoke or fire hazard is detected and announces “Warning Carbon Monoxide” when a CO hazard is detected. The Hush feature temporarily silences nuisance alarms.

Combined Carbon Monoxide and Smoke Alarm - A single unit can be installed where previously, two were needed. Reduces installation time and helps to keep home décor attractive. Test/Reset Button-Tests alarm circuitry and triggers the voice announcement.
LEDs - Flashing green for normal operation and flashing red for alarm condition
Low Battery Warning - The unit warns of a low battery condition by announcing “low battery” and by initiating an alarm chirp and activating a flashing red LED.
Provides protection even during power outages when many fire and carbon monoxide incidents occur. The battery door will not close unless the batteries are properly installed.Voltage:1.3 volts
